User-friendly interface and graphics to help you focus on your game. Even if you make a mistake in your move, you will have the opportunity to correct it, it's just a game! Observe the rules, choose a strategy and the victory will be yours!

name: Star Chindy
description: Star Chindy is a Sci-Fi Roguelike that offers ship-to-ship battle and tactical squad combat.

name: Tarot Readings Premium
description: Use our tarot reading cards adviser to learn about your future and fate!

name: Piece of Princess Cake
description: Sin descripción

name: RV-7 My Drone
description: At some point, on the news or in documentaries, we've all seen the different applications that these devices have, from humanitarian to military.

name: SDK Spriter
description: All-in-one retro game asset studio. Create character and level pixel art. Export your creations to share with all.

name: My Pets
description: Take care of pets at your home!

name: Bigley's Revenge
description: Bigley's Revenge is a Wii U-exclusive first-person shooter from the team behind Meme Run.

name: Grimms Notes Repage
description:
A Mobile Action RPG published by Square Enix.
The game's title was changed to Grimm's Notes Repage in January 2018 alongside a major update that added a new storyline and characters. Almost all account information was retained after the update, an exception being the old story content was only available at the normal difficulty setting.

The game was launched globally in March 2018 by the Korean publisher Flero Games but that version was shutdown in January 2019.

The Japanese version of the game is being shutdown at the end of April 2020 but the final scenario release will be in mid-march.
Instead of being removed from appstores the game will be updated to remove the online/gameplay features, allowing it to continue as a free app that allows players to read through the game's scenarios and will have a gallery feature to view characters.

name: Avoider
description: Players pilot a triangle-shaped spaceship and avoid other like ships.

name: Robot Tsunami
description: Robot Tsunami is an insane, fast paced and unique arcade style twin stick shooter, tower defence & shoot 'em up game all in one.

name: U-Boats
description: U-Boats is a submarine shooter that pits you in exciting top-down naval battles as you combine submersible stealth with action gameplay.

name: Quantum Lock
description: In this multiplayer freeze tag game, one player is selected as the Anti Virus whose job is to isolate all the Rogue Programs running rampant in the system. The Rogue Programs must avoid detection at all costs and gather as much data as they can. Each class has been given four unique class specific abilities to help them succeed in their mission. Play for hours or for only a few minutes in this fast paced, energetic cat and mouse style game.

name: The Growth Journey
description: A game about tactical growth, where growth is irreversible.

name: Fairy Tale Mysteries: The Puppet Thief
description: Discover the truth behind the myth and save the children!

name: Locked-in syndrome
description: Syndrome " locked man" (a syndrome of isolation syndrome of deafferentation )

name: Red Baron Pack
description:
The Red Baron flies again!
Return to the classic Red Baron games with this digital collection featuring the original Red Baron, Red Baron 3D, the Red Baron Mission Builder and high-quality scans of the original manuals, maps and reference cards.

name: Jetpack Fighter
description: Slash your way to victory in the fast action, high-flying Jetpack Fighter!

name: Blasting Agent: Ultimate Edition
description:
Trouble in Antarctica!

The Black Hand of Fate, an international terrorist group, has constructed a secret base within the heart of a Volcano, and have built a massive army of bio-engineered soldiers and genetic monsters to take over the world! You are the only one that can put a stop to their dastardly plans. You are the Blasting Agent!

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 20 - Blackest Night & Wastelands Wonderland
description: The twentieth episode, Blackest Night and Wastelands Wonderland, was released on January 6, 2016 for members with a subscription, and January 13, 2016 for players without an active subscription. The episode revolved around players fighting The Blackest Night and dealing with the fallout from the War of the Light saga. Some of the core features of this episode include one Tier 7 8-Player Operation in Blackest Night and one Tier 7 Duo in Wastelands Wonderland.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Extra 300S
description: The Alabeo Extra 300S for Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition is a great aircraft to use in the aerobatic missions included in-game. Additionally, the speed and versatility of this aircraft makes it ideal for racing with your friends in multiplayer. Pair it with some detailed scenery for a picturesque aerobatic flight simulation experience!

name: Pac-Man Chomp Mania
description: A modern rerelease of the original Pac-Man

name: Halfpipe Hero
description: Halfpipe Hero is an awesome arcade skateboarding game inspired by great classics such as California Games. Featuring simple one tap controls and quick pick-up & play, Halfpipe Hero is a rewarding experience for players of all skill levels.

name: Lonewolf
description:
1 Minute, Your mental-noise has calmed down. It's just you and your weapon. 2 Minutes, You feel the wind, you know the distance, you sense your target's movements. 3 Minutes, You hear the echo of your gunfire... You made the first kill. Silence.

Can you handle it? The story unfolds..

Get immersed in a deep Neo-Noir story driven sniper adventure game.
You step into the role of a mysterious assassin. His motives - a secret.
You did what had to be done to enter the 'Assembly', a criminal organization.

Who is this man? What happened? Soon you'll realize that there's more to him than meets the eye.
The mesmerizing atmosphere and thrilling story will glue you to your device.

While you work for the 'Assembly' you'll get your hands on various weapons.
Sniper Rifles, Assault rifles, Pistols, Bombs and even your bare hands.

name: Hex Mechs
description:
In the year 2523, a large wormhole opened up on the outer limits of Jupiter's orbit. E-CON's Navy stationed on Jupiter's moon Titan were the first to witness as the vast Insectron horde spewed out of the rift torn upon in the Solar System.
Battle across various worlds in this futuristic turn-based strategy game. Utilise a vast array of units to defeat your foes while minimising losses. Mission are varied and challenging and include objectives such as capturing an objective, defending a base and, of course, annihilating the enemy!

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Portal Power
description: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Portal Power is an iOS and Android game released in New Zealand on January 6, 2016 and slowly released through other territories over the subsequent days. A version for PC and Macintosh computers was released with enhanced graphics on December 14, 2017.

name: Panoptes
description: A story driven trading card game about the clandestine operations of an organization known as The Club set in a world of magic and unknown technology.

name: Pixel Starships
description:
Pixel Starships is the world's first full spaceship management game in an 8-bit massive online universe. Build your starship, recruit and train a diverse crew, and engage in epic battles with players around the globe. From constructing a strategic layout for your ship to managing resources like power and weapons, every decision you make impacts your journey through space.

Explore mysterious planets, complete challenging missions, and research advanced technologies to upgrade your ship. With real-time PvP battles, alliances, and a thriving online community, Pixel Starships combines strategy, simulation, and RPG elements in a seamless space-faring adventure.

Whether you’re commanding from the bridge or strategizing your next move, Pixel Starships offers a galaxy of possibilities. Play for free and immerse yourself in this massive multiplayer online universe. Your spaceship, your crew, your story – become a legend in the stars!

name: Candy Crush Jelly Saga
description: Candy Crush Jelly Saga" was soft-launched in various countries for the Android platform. Candy Crush Jelly Saga was released worldwide in January 2016.

name: Divergence: Online
description: Divergence: Online is an open-world sandbox MMO that began as the spiritual successor to Pre-NGE SWG, but since has grown into its own living breathing universe. Divergence was designed to provide unmatched crafting, player and guild housing and player freedom on a scale, we believe, never before achieved. We hope you'll enjoy our Early Access release and help us continue to develop this game!

name: They Came From the Moon
description: What if alien life is closer than we think? Not in faraway galaxies or on planets still unknown to the human race... What if it was shining into our eyes every night for the past 4.5 billion years? They call themselves the Bantarans for Bantara is the native name of the Moon. Similar to humans, and yet so much different.

name: Technolust
description: The world's first fully immersive Cyberpunk adventure made exclusively for the Oculus Rift Virtual Reality System.

name: Squirbs
description: Squirbs is a challenging puzzle-platformer in which you control two cute blue Squirbs simultaneously with one set of controls. Looking for an awesomely difficult game? That's Squirbs.

name: Age of Steel: Recharge
description: "Age of Steel: Recharge" is a 2D strategy with a view from the side. You're taking the role of commander, who was entrusted the management of the military base. Your mission is to defend a base from the waves of enemies at any price.

name: What's under your blanket !?
description:
What is this game?  
It is about a guy, who gets into an awkward situation in a not suitable moment, and tries to overcome it. We all faced such difficulties :)

name: Freudian Slipgate
description: You are playing Quake, you walk into the Slipgate only to find out it's Freudian, suddenly, you are in Doom.. #doomtwid realm, you have angered the #doomtwid gods and they throw you into the random maps for invading their privileges on internet.

name: Davy Jones Dating Simulator
description: Davy Jones Dating Simulator is a comedic dating sim where you date the man who posts seven videos or more per day, Davy Jones himself.

name: 'The
description:
Mario goes on another quest to save the kingdom. What obstacles will he be facing this time?

'the (also known as Coronation Day) is a Horror themed Super Mario World ROM Hack released in January 2016. The hack features Mario in a forest like environment, with various messages coming from a strange, disembodied voice, but there's something more to it than that...

name: World Geography
description: Become an expert in geography with World Geography - Quiz Game. World Geography is a quiz game that will help you to learn everything about countries - maps, flags, emblems, capitals, population, religion, languages, currencies, and much more. This game will help you learn all about geography in an easy and enjoyable way.

name: What Fuwa Bansaku Found
description: A samurai explores a haunted shrine.

name: Bus & Taxi Driving Simulator
description:
Get your driving gloves on and begin your new career as a Bus & Taxi driver! Pick up passengers and take them to their destinations on time, and Park your vehicle neatly on increasingly complex routes.

FEATURES:
▶ 5 ICONIC WORLD TAXIS – from New York, London and more!
▶ 7 BIG BUSES – cars seem to easy? Challenge yourself with steering a big bus!
▶ PASSENGERS TO PICK UP – drive them to their destinations quickly and efficiently!
▶ REALISTIC HILLTOP CITY – explore it at your leisure or get to the destination as quickly as possible

Start your career in Iconic Taxis from around the globe and move on up to the collection of world-famous BIG and LONG Busses! Regardless of what you drive, your task will be similar – picking up the passengers and getting them to their destinations quickly and safely.

You will start out driving iconic, easily recognizable taxis. Feel like a cab driver in London in a famous Black Cab, switch to a Classic Yellow American Chequer Cab, check out some of the European favourites and more! Realistic and fun handling will make every trip an experience for you and your passengers!

When you’ve gained enough experience driving taxis, take up the challenge of steering a big bus around some of the cities tightest corners! Stick to your route and to your timetable, be careful not to crash with your passengers! Pass every mission with the New York Bus, Tour Coaches, London Bus, Classic Yellow School Bus and huge Bendy Bus!

The Main Game Mode including ALL vehicles is 100% FREE to Play, all the way through, no strings attached. In-Game Coins may be purchased with real money to speed up access to some vehicles and extra Game Modes that alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through In-App Purchases.

name: Act It Out! A Game of Charades
description: This game from Snap Finger Click aims to take care of all the setup and score keeping for Charades, leaving the players free to focus on embarrassing themselves!

name: Crazy Belts
description:
Do you know what happens after check-in? Do you think our luggage is safe in the conveyor belts of the airport? Now you can discover the truth!
Crazy Belts is a casual puzzle game that tells the amazing story of our bags, and why they end up in distant countries when we leave them in the belts...

name: Strawberry Vinegar
description:
"Feed me, or I'll reap your soul!"

And with those ridiculous words, my whole life was turned upside down.

Sakuraba Rie, aged nine, is a cynical and grumpy girl who cares little for her fellow classmates, and does not have a single friend. That is, until a self-proclaimed demon from the deepest, darkest pits of Hell suddenly appears in Rie's kitchen and steals a tray of cookies. What will happen between these two young girls? Will friendship blossom between them, or perhaps something more? That is up to the reader to decide — but rest assured, no matter what, there will lots and lots of delicious food!

From Ebi-Hime, creator of "Asphyxia" and "The Way We ALL GO" comes "Strawberry Vinegar" a slice-of-life story with food, cute demons, yuri, and more food.

name: Contract
description: Contract is a side-scrolling shooter in which you must shoot, hack and massacre your way past armed guards, security systems and other challenges in order to reach your targets. You play as a man, blackmailed into the art of assassination by the kidnappers of his brother.

name: Cally's Caves 3
description:
Cally's parents have been abducted, as her arch-enemy Herbert has taken control of the Caves to perform his evil experiments. Join Cally and her friends in this action-packed run and gun platformer, conquering insane bosses, exploring to find secrets, and levelling up EVERYTHING.
Use your weapons to level them up and evolve them into their ultimate forms! Unlock new character abilities like the Triple Jump, Dodge Roll and Water Wings. Use a second playable character, Bera to unleash crazy awesome ninja moves and solve challenging puzzles. Most importantly, battle to rescue your parents from Herbert's clutches, and bring an end to Herbert's experiments for good!

name: Dungeons Are Random
description: Dungeons are Random is a fast-paced roguelike game, where everything is meant to be generated as randomly as possible, while still being enjoyable as a game. It's a mix of a roguelike and an action-rpg game: you improve your hero by running around and fighting monsters, while venturing endless, randomly generated dungeons

name: Elysium: Blood Games
description: Enter a world of blood, influence and secrets in this easy to learn, yet deep strategy sim where you control a group of Gladiators, guiding them through combat and competition. Bribe, gamble and slash your way to an arena championship!

name: The Sad Story of Emmeline Burns
description:
A free game created by Ebi-Hime, author of Asphyxia, The Way We ALL GO, and Strawberry Vinegar. TSSofEB is a free yuri (girls' love) game created for a game jam.

As the saying goes, dead men tell no tales. They only leave tales behind.

name: Suits: A Business RPG
description:
Corporations control the entire global government. Injustice has inspired a revolution in Suits City. Follow the journey of a businessman's descent into corruption...
The Corporation Needs You!
Apply at Suit City HQ today and put the future of the world in your hands!
The Corporation IS you! The Corporation keeps our beloved society in order and in justice.
The Corporation supplies the task and the task supplies cash! And remember citizen, more
reward for the less questions you ask... Our perfect society relies on us to keep the cogs in
the machine lubed up and quiet. The cogs keep the machine running and functional.
We need cogs like you to support the city in the most noble of ways. Take action!
Take a stand! Take this application in your hand and apply now!

name: Hardware: Rivals
description:
Hunt down your opponents in an armoured tank or pursue them at speed in a Fast Attack Vehicle. Enter the fray in an all-terrain battle-fest of online multiplayer action.

Plough through a range of unique combat arenas, claiming bounties, completing Challenges and wreaking terrible vengeance upon old adversaries. With a range of upgrades to unlock as you progress, multiple battle modes and regular community events, there will always be a chance to settle the score.

name: Amplitude
description:
Amplitude is a reboot of the critically-acclaimed controller-based rhythm action game developed by Harmonix and originally released in 2003

Amplitude features over 20 songs composed for an optimal beatmatching experience by Harmonix with contributions from Freezepop, Danny B, Jim Guthrie, and more. Many of the developers from the original game are actively working on the reboot.

The new Amplitude will be treated like a classic, sci-fi concept album. There is a narrative that runs through the game and surfaces in many ways through the visuals, music and song lyrics.

Players will speed down long, winding paths made up of the different musical elements of a song. Each track is differentiated with the musical sounds of synthesizers, drums, vocals, and bass. As players blast away the patterns of gems on these tracks, they release musical energy and recreate the hidden song within.

Gameplay remains easy to pick up and difficult to master. Achieving a top score will be a challenge and therefore worth bragging about via online leaderboards.

Amplitude supports up to four players locally. Challenge your friends and use devastating power-ups during frenetic multiplayer matches to secure your place at the top.

name: PanicBoy go: Pixel man run
description:
Let's run boy!
Can you run at least 10 seconds without being hit?

name: Barony: Cursed Edition
description: Inspired by PC RPG classics of the past, such as Ultima Underworld, System Shock, Daggerfall, and Nethack, Barony: Cursed Edition places players in the shoes of a hero that must descend to the bottom of a dark dungeon known as the Devil's Bastion and destroy an undead lich named Baron Herx, who terrorized the peaceful town of Hamlet in life and is now harboring a curse against the land from beyond the grave.

name: Walk the Light
description: A unique puzzle game where you control a mysterious light source to help Charlie escape the caverns he's been trapped in. Use an assortment of light shapes to tackle each puzzle set before you! Overcome traps and pits to reach the exit of each stage! Available on Mac and Windows.

name: Linea, the Game
description: The goal of the game is to survive for more than 60 seconds on each level, dodging platforms and objects, listening to bitpop soundtracks. Four levels, online-records, achievements and trading cards are waiting for you.

name: A Wild Catgirl Appears!
description: A Wild Catgirl Appears is a short romance visual novel featuring multiple routes, different girls to date and of course, catgirls! You follow the story of Ami, a loner at high school, as she joins the school's coding club and sets about making her first video game.

name: GooCubelets: The Algoorithm
description: Billions of year ago in a faraway goolaxy living organisms were combined with the goo nebula formulae. And the Algoorithm was created. Time has passed, and the Algoorithm remained incomplete... You are given a chance to solve the last 50 equations! But be careful, even a small mistake could end everything!

name: Defenders
description: Sin descripción

name: Chowderchu
description:
Made for Wizards, by Wizards. 
 
Chowderchu tells the tale of how two unlikely 'zard-buddies join forces to overcome great obstacles. 
 
A challenging game with a unique play-style involving the mouse and keyboard. Creative problem-solving is essential and there are different ways of approaching each level.

name: Tap My Katamari
description: A Bandai Namco developed endless clicker iOS and Android game based on the long running Katamari series.

name: Pony Island
description: Pony Island is a suspense puzzle game in disguise. You are in limbo, trapped in a malevolent and malfunctioning arcade machine devised by the devil himself. It is not a game about ponies.

name: Clash Royale
description: Enter the Arena! Clash Royale is a real-time multiplayer game starring the Royales, your favorite Clash characters and much, much more. Collect and upgrade dozens of cards featuring the Clash of Clans troops, spells and defenses you know and love, as well as the Royales: Princes, Knights, Baby Dragons and more. Knock the enemy King and Princesses from their towers to defeat your opponents and win Trophies, Crowns and glory in the Arena. Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community.

name: Agoraphobia: Director's Cut
description:
A story of fear and doubts about reality, decisions and regrets, dreams and darkness.
~
A psychological horror adventure that takes the player through the wide corridors of a mysterious estate and confronts the protagonist with far-reaching decisions.
~
Find your own path, explore the sinister estate and uncover some of its deep-rooted secrets.
~
Leave this waking nightmare behind you, or slide further and further down into the rabbit hole of the Labyrinth of Agoraphobia.

name: Poena
description: Poena is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as a boy named Kasetsuki who refuses to leave his room for unknown reasons. The main objective of the game is to explore the dream world and collect all the effects (known as :Culpa:).

name: Yo-kai Watch Land
description: Imagine Yo-kai in the palm of your hand! Take selfies, play mini-games, and scan your Yo-kai Medals to bring Yo-kai to life on your mobile device!

name: The Pirate: Caribbean Hunt
description:
Hail to the Captain!
Sail into the heart of the Caribbean in the Age of Piracy - the time of black flags and white skulls, blue waves and golden opportunities.
Hoist the Jolly Roger and grab the steering wheel to sail through battles and raids, ransoms and treasures, to become the Crimson King of the Antilles!

name: Doomworld Roulette: Session 2
description: The second in a series of exercises that dares participants to break away from the trends and ideas typical in day-to-day Dooming. The challenge? Create a map that best depicts a theme generated by jmickle66666666's level theme generator. Themes were created, numbered and then hidden from participants, who were made to select a number at random in order to be assigned a theme. The event ran for just under two weeks, totalling 11 maps. These maps are designed to be played from pistol start.

name: BlockTanks
description: A web browser tank game focused on multiplayer battles in a simplistic format. Featuring multiple battle modes, weapon types, maps, and community maps.

name: Toon Cup 2016
description: Sin descripción

name: Fortune Tellers Academy
description: A free-to-play mobile jRPG developed by Square Enix's in-house studio led by Jun Fujisawa (the creator of Dragon Quest IX, among other titles).

name: Rockman X: 2016 New Year's Hack
description: Sin descripción

name: The Unknown Planet
description: A mysterious and strange map on a weird alien planet.

name: Bloodstain
description:
Bloodstain is a full 32-map megawad for Doom2 made by Pavel Tvrzník, Czech Doom mapper known in the Doom community as Pipicz.

Bloodstain's map format is limit-removing Doom2. Recommend playing
with complevel 2, although it can certainly be played on other comp-
levels too.

name: MotoGP Arcade
description:
Now you can become a MotoGP sensation and race against Valentino Rossi, Jorge Lorenzo and Marc Marquez in the all new MotoGP arcade simulator created by the world's largest arcade game manufacture in the US, Raw Thrills.

Lean into turns on an authentic MotoGP motorcycle and take your shot at racing against famous riders or up to eight of your friends. A stunning HD display, a player facing camera, and a mounted fan lets you and your friends feel the thrill of the fastest bikes in the world. Online connectivity not only allows STAT tracking to see how you stack up against your competition, but you can also race other riders locally or in other locations!

Test your riding skills in Novice, Normal, and Pro difficulty levels, while you race on 10 famous MotoGP circuits from around the world. Experience the ALL NEW MotoGP for yourself at an entertainment center near you or purchase your own, ready, set, GO! ​

name: Super Metroid: Rotation
description:
It's Super Metroid, but on its side.
Play the game with the ground tilted vertically.
Samus and the enemies remain upright and the controls are the same, but the game world itself is rotated 90 degrees clockwise.
In short, everything that used to be ground is now a wall.

name: Fallen London: The Art of Murder
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for January, 2016. Second entry in the Season of Heart's Blood.

name: Super Mario World Randomizer
description: Sin descripción

name: Gay Harem
description: Collect sexy men to build your harem and complete quests in this browser game built around resource management. Explicit scenes; adults only.

name: White Sky
description:
A fourth-grader lives in a society without creativity, in which your school grades are the sole factor which determine your success. But there is a house nearby her own that is known for containing some source of creativity: as it is the only part of the town with color. She is told to never enter.
One day, however, she does, and enters the world of another fourth-grader named Toby, who also lives in a world bereft of creativity. He is the only one who can see her, which makes him appear insane, if his aberrational personality and appearance weren't enough. After a certain amount of time, however, she disappears back to her own world, leaving him alone until she enters the house again. As a part of his mind, she witnesses the climbs and downfalls of his subconscious.

name: Tekling
description: Become a robot, save the world. Jump and dodge your way through 70+ levels of frenetic gameplay in the same vein of super meet boy and megaman. Collect the orbs to transform from frail human into mighty Tekling, defender of the innocent and enemy to exploding barrels everywhere.

name: Sort the Court!
description: Give your decree in simple yes or no answers, and help the kingdom grow!

name: Rucoy Online
description: Rucoy Online is an MMORPG for mobile platforms.

name: War: 13th Day
description: How has the sun disappeared from Virgo Island? Hear the story from an elegant lady or a sassy warrioress. Each has their own version of the events that led to the sun's disappearance. Decide whether their tale ends in romance, heartbreak, or even murder. Uncover the truth behind your plight. Learn more about their world and the clans that populate it.

name: Taisen! Bomberman
description: A Bomberman game by Konami available for iOS and Android devices. Includes single player and online public/private multiplayer for up to four players.

name: Atrox
description: A 2d Indie skill game

name: Orbs
description: Orbs is a truly unique science-fiction Massive Multiplayer Online Role Playing Game featuring an open world where players are sent to explore, control and rule futuristic and mysterious zones in order to discover their secrets.

name: Critical Ops
description:
Critical Ops is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience the thrill of modern terrorist warfare as you fight a critical strike operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist.
Start or join a clan and fight for domination alongside your friends, or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard.

name: Iron Snout
description: Iron Snout is a fast, colorful and brutal fighting game in which you will be helping a piglet fight for its life against hordes of wolves.

name: Toast!
description: Toast offers a casual yet exciting adventure and arcade experience. Players will play as "Fred the bread" as they journey through multiple worlds trying to avoid other foods for risk of becoming toast. The main goal of toast is to create a family friendly yet exciting game for people of all ages.

name: The Dwarves
description: The Dwarves is a fantasy role-playing game with a strong story and tactically challenging real-time battles. 15 playable heroes, each with individual skills, are to be deployed cleverly. Take on superior numbers of orcs, ogres, älfs, bögnilim, zombies, dark mages and many more foes, to give them the low-down.

name: The Terminator
description: Made with Shoot'Em-Up Construction Kit, or SEUCK, The Terminator could be described as a Commando clone. Set in post-apocalyptic future after Skynet took over and humans lost the war, you're part of the resistance fighting against the robot overlords.

name: DsDooM3
description: DsDoom 3 is a 32-level total conversion for Doom II created by Sniper 109 for Boom-compatible ports. DsDoom 3 was created to maintain compatibility with the DS Doom port, which was created to play Doom on Nintendo DS handheld consoles and is based on PrBoom. As the name of the WAD and the title screen indicate, the mod is heavily based off Doom 3, with its weapons and most of its enemies being closely modeled after that game, featuring new and unique behaviors through DeHackEd.

name: 2048: StarWars
description: A fun, addictive and a very simple puzzle game. Join the similar tiles and get to the 2048 tile!

name: Puchi Nikki
description: Puchi Nikki is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame by Villit for the Nintendo 3DS.

name: Arcana: Seal of Rimsala
description: Sin descripción

name: The Mini Crossword
description: A mini version of the New York Times crossword puzzle featuring 5 words across and 5 words down.

name: 1812: La Aventura
description: Sin descripción

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Forbidden Memories II Ultimate
description: Sin descripción

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Forbidden Memories: Alpha Mod
description: Sin descripción

name: Pyramid Solitaire
description: Use the cards from the deck and cards from the pyramid to make pairs. You can only cycle the deck three times, so be careful you don’t run out of moves and lose the game!

name: Mia Fey: Ace Spirit Attorney
description: Follow Mia Fey, the original Turnabout Lawyer, as she uncovers the secrets of DL-6. Murder after murder, incident after incident, Mia Fey is one step closer to the the truth about DL-6. But at the same time, she's also getting herself into a cutthroat world of law, where all is not what it seems. In fact, the law system is broken. Prosecutors getting replaced every week, the prosecution department short on prosecutors... Utter chaos in the law. The ultimate question: will Mia Fey survive the world of law, and will she uncover the truth about DL-6? Or will she die trying?

name: Preguntados
description: Preguntados tests people's knowledge and strategies, ranging from entertainment and sports to history, art, science and geography. The games are played by two simultaneous players who must answer correctly.

name: Ice Slider Z
description: Sin descripción

name: Average Maria Individual
description: Average Maria Individual is a parody of Super Mario Bros. created for Ruin Jam in 2015.

name: A Prelude to Chaos
description: The Cyborg Queen is coming. Only you stand in her way. Find and destroy generators to save the day.

name: Retroplay Controller
description:
A plug & play famiclone with games from companies like Nice Code Software, Waixing and Inventor.
